About the Company: K G Denim Limited is an India-based textile company. The Company is engaged in manufacturing and sale of fabrics and apparels. The Companys product range includes denim, apparel fabric, home textiles and apparels. Apparel fabric consists of stretch twills, jean twills and stretch, with or without lycra. Home textiles consist of bed range, bath range and kitchen range. It also includes a blend of cotton and natural fibers such as wool, linen & fiber blend. The Companys subsidiaries include Trigger Apparels Limited and KG Denim (USA) Inc.
